All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bluetooth
Represents a Bluetooth wireless communication device.
BME280
Represents a BME280 temperature sensor device.
Device
Abstract base class representing a generic device in the system.
Device.State
Enum representing device power state.
DHT11
Represents a DHT11 temperature sensor device.
Display
Represents a generic display device that can print messages.
GY951
Represents a GY951 IMU sensor device.
hwSystem
The main class that manages the entire hardware system.
I2C
Represents the I2C communication protocol implementation.
IMUSensor
Abstract base class representing an IMU (Inertial Measurement Unit) sensor.
LCD
Represents an LCD display device.
Main
Main class for running the hardware system simulation.
MotorDriver
Represents a generic motor driver device capable of controlling motor speed.
MPU6050
Represents an MPU6050 IMU sensor device.
OLED
Represents an OLED display device.
OneWire
Represents the OneWire communication protocol.
PCA9685
Represents the PCA9685 motor driver device.
Protocol
Interface representing a communication protocol used by devices.
Sensor
Abstract base class for all sensor devices in the system.
SparkFunMD
Represents the SparkFunMD motor driver device.
SPI
Represents the SPI (Serial Peripheral Interface) communication protocol.
TempSensor
Abstract base class for temperature sensor devices.
UART
Represents the UART (Universal Asynchronous Receiver-Transmitter) communication protocol.
Wifi
Represents a WiFi wireless communication device.
WirelessIO
Abstract base class representing wireless communication devices.
